Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, room need improvement”
Reviews.Author: GKA33
Reviews.Content: If you want a place to stay overnight near Ponce downtown,at a good price, this is the perfect hotel.The rooms need improvement,the TV are from the 90's,the bathroom are very small.The breakfast included is ok and the pool is clean and good for the children.

Reviews.Title: “Okay hotel, crazy staff”
Reviews.Author: Lauren M
Reviews.Content: On a week long trip around the island, we opted to spend one night at the Quality Inn outside of Ponce. We were trying to balance our trip with higher end hotels in places where we were staying more nights and cheaper, more basic lodgings when only a one night stay was required. First off, yes, this hotel is in the middle of a race track. That didn't bother us. We never heard any noise or had any race-day complications. The grounds are decent, about what you would expect from basic accommodations. The turtle pool and outdoor areas were quaint. Our main issue was with the housekeeping staff. We placed a do not disturb sign on the door even though we intended to depart for a drive back to San Juan at about 8-9am. At approximately 6am, there was loud banging on our door. Due to the hour, we thought it must have been some sort of mistake, and we tried to ignore it given we had placed the do not disturb sign. The banging stopped, only to resume again about an hour later. My husband got up to see what the problem was, and spoke with a handy person who was about to start mowing the lawn, explaining that we did not need anything and it was hours until check-out. At this point, we were awake so I headed to the shower as he went to check out breakfast options. During my shower, I could hear constant, repetitive bangs on the door as if someone was using a battering ram to try to gain entrance to the room. Upon my husband's return, we literally grabbed our things and fled. I finished my make-up in the car because we were certain that we would be given no peace for the rest of the time we were there. Upon checking out, the person at the front desk stated that housekeeping had been trying to get in touch with us because they weren't sure whether we had ever checked in or not. This seemed strange to us since we had placed the sign on the door and we had clearly spoken to staff the day before and the person mowing the lawn earlier that morning. It also seemed strange that someone from the front desk would not have simply called the room with the working phone. We were practically the only guests at the hotel that night. There were maybe 2 other cars in the lot both when we arrived and when we departed. During our entire stay, walking around the courtyard and the pool, we never saw another guest. Our best guess was that housekeeping wanted into the one room they would have to clean so that they could move on with their day. This made our stay nearly intolerable. The room itself was basic. Fairly clean. No major problems. But we would not go back due to the lack of hospitality of some of the staff.

Reviews.Title: “Tried again, disappointed”
Reviews.Author: DandDTravelers
Reviews.Content: I was on a five-day cross-island trip with my oldest daughter, and chose to stay here because I was familiar with the hotel, having stayed here the year before on a similar trip with my younger daughter. (I used Choice Hotel points for this stay, as I had the year before.) I had read negative reviews before the first stay and felt that stay was better than expected, so I gave it a three. However, this time I had reasonable expectations - and was let down. Three items: 1) no hot water; 2) broken shower head: 3) no TV remote in room. When I told the front desk in the evening there was no hot water, they said it was being fixed soon. There was still no hot water for morning showers; I told the front desk, and they said it had been fixed; maybe the temperature I got was as warm as it gets. Since I wasn't in the shower that long, the broken shower head wasn't as big of an issue if I had wanted to take a nice, long shower. Strange, but last year there was no TV remote in the room. Since the front desk was closed when I noticed, one of the night security guards brought me one. Two pluses - guest laundry that worked; good breakfast. The only downside to the breakfast was a dog that hung outside the room, trying to get in when guests went in or out. The front desk didn't hand out cans of Off as they did last year, but that was OK, since there was only one mosquito in the room - and I think I killed it! There was a race going on, but you couldn't tell from inside our room on the garden side of the hotel. While I used points for this stay, next time I will try another hotel in town - and use either points or cash. One nice thing about this hotel is the garden area - which has a turtle pond and setting for photos.

Reviews.Title: “Get away”
Reviews.Author: bigrig207
Reviews.Content: The hotel is right in the middle of a race track. For some this may be a problem but we completely enjoyed it. We found this place on our trip around the west end of PR. The hotel is a quaint well kept place. Our younger kids loved the turtle ponds and they all enjoyed the pool and hammock pavilion. The breakfast is standard fare. It is a short 5 minute drive into Ponce where there is everything your heart could desire. By the time we arrive here the kids were worn out from visiting San Juan, Aguadillia and Rincon so to just chill out in a secluded place was a welcome change, we actually extended our stay an extra day! Also... there is a go cart track that was loads of fun, a little spendy but still fun. If you're looking for a resort or the hustle and bustle of the city this place is not for you, But if you wanna relax in a somewhat central location on the Carribiean side of the island this place is pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: “Never Never Nevrt Again Unless Uoulike Cold Shower”
Reviews.Author: Travelermarus
Reviews.Content: I thought being a Choice Hotels it will be to their standards. It was nothing but disappointment in every aspect. Bathroom was so small and No hot water at all. I thought of calling front desk ... Phone did not work. Think twice before going there. Choice hotels needs to reinspect rooms so loyal guest would not suffer... It wss hortible experience. Never again.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: DandDTravelers
Reviews.Content: My adult daughter and I stayed here one night during our six-day tour of Puerto Rico. We were simply looking for a decent place to stay in between places on our tour - and the Quality Inn met that need. I had concerns about staying here based on reviews - about it being in the middle of a race track and the presence of mosquitos. Neither were an issue. When we arrived, we did notice that races were going on; the front desk staff recommended the garden side (opposite the track side), and we did not hear the race noise at all inside the room. At check in we were given a can of "Off" bug spray - which did concern us some. However, we did not encounter a bug inside or outside the room. We did not use the pool, but it looked inviting. The breakfast in the morning was good. The garden areas were a nice bonus; we took pictures there to remember the occasion. FYI, I did use Choice Privileges points instead of paying cash for the room, but I would have paid for it if I had no points.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special”
Reviews.Author: viajero5
Reviews.Content: We needed a place to stop overnight enroute to our next location and came across this place. The staff at the reception desk were polite, helpful, friendly and professional. The rooms, while clean, are really in need of an overhaul. The room looked rather worn out and dated. It was fine for a late night arrival/place to sleep but I wouldn't stay there otherwise.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay!”
Reviews.Author: coquiOmaha
Reviews.Content: Everything about this hotel was great. The staff at the desk and the security guard were very friendly and helpful. It was very reasonably priced. The pool and breakfast were very good. There is a charming pond with turtles and large goldfish on the grounds. It is right next to a raceway but we didn't notice the noise in our room and I'm pretty sure it was a race night. There were very few guests when we stayed which was kind of good in that we got the pool to ourselves. If you are visiting the south coast this hotel is a good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “I have never seen a more poorly managed establishment!”
Reviews.Author: OEFWarrior
Reviews.Content: On the first day someone tried to enter the room and when I went to call the front desk and found it closed at 11:00pm. Security was available but not very vigilant. Other guest in the hotel were rude and younger guest were unsupervised. During our stay there a group from Venezuela Taekwondo was there and they were young and unsupervised. Though I reported to the staff my discontent with how much noise there was, little action was take. Also there is a drag strip track to the rear of the hotel where they run cars till about 1:00am, this is never disclosed and no apology was offered for the excessive noise. I have stayed in Puerto Rico cuntless number of times and have never been so disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “It was a nightmare”
Reviews.Author: Mamidear
Reviews.Content: It was the worst hotel we ever stay in. I don't recommend this hotel to anyone. But good luck to those that do stay.

Reviews.Title: “Think twice!”
Reviews.Author: aventnyc
Reviews.Content: This place is a dump as well as the other 6 hotels we stayed in here in Puerto Rico. Actually I should day this whole island is a dump! I usually travel once a year with my family and we had travel to Jamaica, Dominican Republic, and Bahamas so we thought we would give Puerto Rico a shot and it sucked! First we reserved a suite with supposedly a full kitchen but all i saw was a cheap microwave and a small refrigerator. The double beds were stained and the sofa bed was full of bed bugs. In all 6 hotels there were beds with bed bugs here in Puerto Rico. I was so disappointed! Please dont get fooled by the price because its just not worth it!

Reviews.Title: “Quick and easy location”
Reviews.Author: MIOldLady
Reviews.Content: We stopped for the night having no other plans. The room was very inconvenient, as the internet cable was behind the furthest bed and the desk was in the opposite corner. The AC unit was very noisy. There was no place to plug in the computer or recharge my phone. The tub did not drain, so the water was past your ankles by the end of the shower. Also there was no beach, as the water was contaminated.

Reviews.Title: “Is not the worse place, Noisy, and patched up! Maybe a 1 star!!!”
Reviews.Author: RiveraSanchez
Reviews.Content: As long as you know, this more of a MOTEL was build in the middle of a RACE TRACK!!! Yes! They used the center Pits and converted them into Motel rooms. I travel 70% of the month and have seen a share of hotels, but this was one of the worst experiences I have ever had. First the RACE track engine noise, NO HIGH SPEED INTERNET, NO WIRELESS. The night staff was very helpful but working miracles with what management gave them! Which was a Wireless LAPTOP stick to supply INTERNETto all rooms and wireless infrastructure! I still can not figure out how is that possible! The settings inside the rooms were more of a Cheap Motel, if this hotel was in the rage of $39.00 per night I would be content. But at $100 is an outrage! This one star property needs a new management... I hope this is not the typical setting of a Quality Inn... I am still looking for the quality in fact I asked for a refund as they advertise 100% Satisfaction Guarantee... and I will follow up! Is not a setting for a family, maybe a little adventure and business at the most! to as in my stay they were doing miracles as they we atempting

Reviews.Title: “LOVED QUALITY INN”
Reviews.Author: SunShyne327
Reviews.Content: Ponce: Quality Inn El Tuque: "Absolutely Magnificent!!!! August 3rd thru the 15th 2008 My Husband and I returned home to Florida today and our trip was absolutely magnificent! We never experienced such a lovely stay at a Hotel like we had at the Quality Inn El Tuque. The Staff was very very friendly and pleasent. One of the things that impressed us the most was the cleanliness of the Hotel. The grounds were kept up beautifully and the pool was absolutely beautiful and crystal clean at all times. The location is perfect. Close to any and everything that you would need. I really liked the idea of having the Security there at night. It was very quiet at night and you could enjoy the pool as late as you wanted. The continental breakfast was wonderful. And the dining area was kept very clean. I liked the fact that there was a laundry facility on site, which I used twice during our stay. To my Husband and I there are just not enough nice things we can say about our experience at the Hotel and for the very caring and friendly staff at Quality Inn El Tuque! All we can say is that our next trip to Puerto Rico we will make reservations with this same Hotel. We loved our stay there!

Reviews.Title: “The worse experience ever!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: HeroeSanJuan_PR
Reviews.Content: It was the worse experience I ever had in a Hotel. The Hotel Rates might be attractive, cheap, but is a dumpster! You get what you pay for I guess. My husband, 5 year old son and I stayed at this hotel from Dec.31, 2007 through January 2, 2008. First of all, this hotel is located in a town that is the hottest in temperature all year long in Puerto Rico. During our stay it was above 90 F daily, with tons of mosquitoes flying all around you and chewing you up at the same time. The room they gave had a clog bath tub, mildew all over the bathroom. We informed the hotel about this situation and it was until the night before we left, at 10:00 pm that they moved us to another room after the toilet also clogged and the AC was not working at all. After 11:00 pm there is nobody at the front desk in case you need help with anything. There is only one security guard in the entire hotel doing rounds during the entire night, nobody else. We got chew up by bed bugs as well, in both rooms we stayed. The continental breakfast they give is terrible, compare to other hotels. When there is not enough people in the room where they served it they don't turn the AC on so anybody that is having breakfast there have to get ready to sweat, because you have no other option. I mind, and this are only few things that had happened to us during our stay. If I describe everything I will never finish this review. Honestly, DO NOT STAY AT THIS DUMPSTER!!!!!!!

HotelInfo.Name: Quality Inn El Tuque
HotelInfo.Address: 3330 Ponce By Pass | Carretera #2, Km 220.1, Ponce 00728-1510, Puerto Rico (Formerly "Hotel El Tuque")
